ComicInfo.Summary:
October, 1944. Nazi fortunes appear bleaker by the day as the Allied noose around Germany tightens during the waning days of World War II. But in the bowels of the Wenceslas Mines, a terrible threat has emerged... The Nazis have discovered the ability to conquer time itself with the help of a new ominous device! Now a rag tag group of American GIs must stop this threat to the past, present, and future... While dealing with their past, prejudices, and fears in the process. THIS ISSUE: Guided by the mysterious young Ella, our band of American GI heroes make their way toward the secret Nazi base. They are quickly met with the most gruesome of threats... mutated SS animal soldiers, hungry for Allied flesh!!! Will the Time Grunts survive this grotesque encounter, or will they be devoured by these unholy creatures?!?
*Notes:* The cover is a homage of the cover of Batman #428.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-27 18:00:36. [CVDB671165]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Alex Sanchez, Patrick Thomas Parnell, Alex Sanchez, Patrick Thomas Parnell
ComicInfo.Inker: Alex Sanchez, Patrick Thomas Parnell, Alex Sanchez, Patrick Thomas Parnell
